trans-unit.source: Displays a single-month calendar that enables the user to select dates and move to the next or previous month.
trans-unit.target: Viser en kalender i én måned som gjør det mulig at brukeren velger datoer og flytte til neste eller forrige måned.

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#Introduction) - [Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## Introduction Use the Calendar control to display a single month of a calendar on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: I dette emnet:- [Introduksjon](#Introduction) - [tilgjengelighet](#Accessibility) - [deklarerende syntaksen](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## Introduksjon Bruk Kalender-kontrollen skal vises én måned i en kalender på en webside.

trans-unit.source: The control allows you to select dates and move to the next or previous month.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen kan du velge datoer og flytte til neste eller forrige måned.

trans-unit.source: The Calendar control supports all the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar?displayProperty=fullName> types in the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Kalender-kontrollen støtter alle de <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar?displayProperty=fullName>datatyper i den <xref:System.Globalization>navneområde.</xref:System.Globalization> </xref:System.Globalization.Calendar?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Apart from the Gregorian calendar, this also includes calendars that use different year and month systems, such as the Hjiri calendar.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg til gregoriansk kalender omfatter dette også kalendere som bruker ulike år og måned systemer, for eksempel Hjiri-kalender.

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the Calendar control allows you to select a single day, week, or entire month by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi om Kalender-kontrollen, kan du velge en enkelt dag, uke eller hele måneden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the control displays the days of the month, day headings for the days of the week, a title with the month name and year, links for selecting individual days of the month, and links for moving to the next and previous month.
trans-unit.target: Som standard viser kontrollen dager i måneden, dagen overskrifter for ukedagene, en tittel med navn på måned og år, koblinger for å velge individuelle dager i måneden og koblinger til å flytte til neste og forrige måned.

trans-unit.source: You can customize the appearance of the Calendar control by setting the properties that control the style for different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan tilpasse utseendet til kalender-kontroll ved å angi egenskaper som styrer stilen for ulike deler av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties that specify the style for the different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskaper som angir stilen for de ulike delene av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayHeaderStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the section that displays the days of the week.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the dates in the displayed month.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextPrevStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the navigation controls in the title section.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the dates that are not in the currently displayed month.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the selected dates on the calendar.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectorStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the week and month date-selection column.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TitleStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the title section.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for today's date.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A>|Specifies the style for the weekend dates.| You can also show or hide different parts of the control.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayHeaderStyle%2A>| Angir stilen for delen som vises i ukedagene. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>| Angir stilen for datoer i måneden som vises. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextPrevStyle%2A>| Angir stilen for Sidenavigeringskontrollene vises i delen tittel. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A>| Angir stilen for datoer som ikke er i måneden som vises for øyeblikket. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A>| Angir stilen for de valgte datoene i kalenderen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectorStyle%2A>| Angir stilen for kolonnen uke og måned dato-valg. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TitleStyle%2A>| Angir stilen for tittel-delen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A>| Angir stilen for dagens dato. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A>| Angir stilen for helgen datoer. | Du kan vise eller skjule ulike delene av kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TitleStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectorStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextPrevStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayHeaderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser egenskaper som styrer hvilke deler vises eller skjules.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A>|Shows or hides the section that displays the days of the week.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowGridLines%2A>|Shows or hides the gridlines between the days of the month.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>|Shows or hides the navigation controls to the next or previous month.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowTitle%2A>|Shows or hides the title section.| Although binding to a data source is not supported for the Calendar control, you can modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells.
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Beskrivelse | |--------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A>| Viser eller skjuler delen som vises i ukedagene. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowGridLines%2A>| Viser eller skjuler rutenett mellom dager i måneden. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>| Viser eller skjuler Sidenavigeringskontrollene vises til neste eller forrige måned. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowTitle%2A>| Viser eller skjuler tittel-delen. | Selv om binding til en datakilde ikke støttes for Kalender-kontrollen, kan du endre innhold og formatering for dato-celler.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowTitle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowGridLines%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before the Calendar control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control.
trans-unit.target: Før Kalender-kontrollen vises på siden, oppretter og setter sammen komponentene som utgjør kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event is raised when each date cell in the Calendar control is created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>denne hendelsen oppstår når alle dato-cellene i Kalender-kontrollen er opprettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>

trans-unit.source: You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell as it is created by providing code in the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere innholdet og formatering celleegenskaper dato slik den er opprettet ved hjelp av koden i hendelsesbehandlingen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>

trans-unit.source: For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan du tilpasser innholdet i en dato-celle, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Calendar control renders ECMAScript (JScript, JavaScript) to the client browser.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I kalenderen kontrollen gjengir ECMAScript (JScript, JavaScript) til klientleseren.

trans-unit.source: The client browser must have ECMAScript enabled for this control to function properly.
trans-unit.target: Klientleseren må ha ECMAScript aktivert for denne kontrollen skal fungere riktig.

trans-unit.source: For more information on client script, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon på klienten script [klienten skriptet i ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards.
trans-unit.target: ## Tilgjengelighet markup gjengis som standard for denne kontrollen, kan ikke med kravene for tilgjengelighet standarder.

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om tilgjengelighet støtte for denne kontrollen, kan du se [ASP.NET-kontroller og tilgjengelighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                  ```
trans-unit.target: ## Deklarerende syntaks.```                                                                                  ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette og starte en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a text value that is rendered as a caption for the calendar.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en tekstverdi som gjengis som en tittel for kalenderen.

trans-unit.source: A table caption is used to describe the nature of the table in one to three sentences.
trans-unit.target: En tabelltekst som beskriver typen tabellen i en til tre setninger.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CaptionAlign%2A> property to align the caption with the calendar.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CaptionAlign%2A>til å justere teksten med kalenderen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.CaptionAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [ASP.NET globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The table caption.
trans-unit.target: Teksten for tabellen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the text that is rendered as a caption for the calendar.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tekstjusteringen som gjengis som en tittel for kalenderen.

trans-unit.source: This property determines where the caption appears in relation to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer denne egenskapen der teksten vises i forhold til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>, which lets the browser determine where to align the caption.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>, som gjør at nettleseren avgjøre hvor du vil justere teksten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>

trans-unit.source: The following table explains the relationship between the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign> value and the appearance of the caption.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor forklarer relasjonen mellom de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>verdi og utseendet til teksten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>

trans-unit.source: |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign> value|Appearance| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------| |`Bottom`|The caption appears at the bottom of the calendar, with the text centered.| |`Left`|The caption appears at the top of the calendar, with the text left-aligned.| |`NotSet`|The caption alignment is not set and is determined by the browser.| |`Right`|The caption appears at the top of the calendar, with the text right-aligned.| |`Top`|The caption appears at the top of the calendar with the text centered.|
trans-unit.target: | verdien for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>| Utseendet | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------| | `Bottom`| Teksten vises nederst i kalenderen, med teksten midtstilt. | | `Left`| Teksten vises øverst i kalenderen, med teksten venstrejustert. | | `NotSet`| Tekstjustering for er ikke angitt og avgjøres av nettleseren. | | `Right`| Teksten vises øverst i kalenderen, med teksten høyrejustert. | | `Top`| Teksten vises øverst i kalenderen med teksten midtstilt. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"></xref> value that indicates the alignment of the caption.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"> </xref> verdi som angir justeringen for teksten.

trans-unit.source: The value specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCaptionAlign"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden mellom innholdet i en celle, og den cellen kantlinje.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å kontrollere avstanden mellom innholdet i en celle, og den cellen kantlinje.

trans-unit.source: The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Hvor utfylling angitt legges til alle sidene av en celle.

trans-unit.source: Individual cell sizes cannot be specified.
trans-unit.target: Enkelte celler størrelser kan ikke angis.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting this property to `-1` indicates that this property is not set in the rendered table.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når egenskapen settes `-1` indikerer at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt i den gjengitte tabellen.

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between the contents of a cell and the cell's border.
trans-unit.target: Hvor mye mellomrom (i piksler) mellom innholdet i en celle, og den cellen kantlinje.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_2" name="2" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_2" name="2" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified cell padding is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte celleutfyllingen er mindre enn -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space between cells.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir avstanden mellom celler.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to control the spacing between individual cells in the calendar.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å kontrollere avstanden mellom individuelle celler i kalenderen.

trans-unit.source: This spacing is applied both vertically and horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Denne avstand brukes både loddrett og vannrett.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting this property to `-1` indicates that this property is not set in the rendered table.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når egenskapen settes `-1` indikerer at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt i den gjengitte tabellen.

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between cells.
trans-unit.target: Hvor mye diskplass (i piksler) mellom celler.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_0" name="0" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified cell spacing is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte cellen avstanden er mindre enn -1.

trans-unit.source: Creates a collection to store child controls.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en samling skal kunne lagres underordnede kontroller.

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlCollection method is primarily of interest to control developers who extend the functionality of the Calendar control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateControlCollection er primært interessant for kontrollutviklere som utvide funksjonaliteten til Kalender-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Always returns an <xref uid="langword_csharp_InternalControlCollection" name="InternalControlCollection" href=""></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid en <xref uid="langword_csharp_InternalControlCollection" name="InternalControlCollection" href=""> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the section that displays the day of the week.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilegenskaper for delen som viser dagen i uken.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the section that displays the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi stilen for delen som viser dager i uken.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om annen stil egenskapene som kan kontrolleres, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The name format for the days of the week is controlled by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayNameFormat%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Navneformat for ukedagene kontrolleres av de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayNameFormat%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayNameFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property applies only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains the style properties for the section that displays the day of the week.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som inneholder stilegenskaper for delen som viser dagen i uken.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name format for days of the week.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir formatet for for ukedagene.

trans-unit.source: Use the DayNameFormat property to specify the name format for the days of the week.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DayNameFormat-egenskapen til å angi navneformatet for dager i uken.

trans-unit.source: This property is set with one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er angitt med en av de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat>nummereringsverdier.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat>

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the days of the week are displayed as the full name, short (abbreviated) name, first letter of the day, or first two letters of the day.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi om ukedagene vises som det fullstendige navnet, korte (forkortelse), første bokstaven i dagen eller første to bokstaver på dagen.

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare hvis det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowDayHeader%2A>

trans-unit.source: The day names are based on the server's local settings.
trans-unit.target: Navn på dager er basert på den lokale serverinnstillinger.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Short" name="Short" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_Short" name="Short" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified day name format is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Formatet for angitte dagen er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayNameFormat"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when each day is created in the control hierarchy for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når hver dag opprettes i kontrollen hierarkiet for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when each day is created in the control hierarchy for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når hver dag opprettes i kontrollen hierarkiet for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: Although data binding is not supported for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells.
trans-unit.target: Selv om databinding ikke støttes for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontroll, er det mulig å endre innholdet og formatering for dato-celler.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control.
trans-unit.target: Før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontrollen skal vises på siden, oppretter og setter sammen komponentene som utgjør kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: The DayRender event is raised when each date cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is created.
trans-unit.target: DayRender denne hendelsen oppstår når hver dato celle i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontrollen er opprettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the DayRender event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere innholdet og formateringen celleegenskaper dato når den opprettes ved å angi koden i hendelsesbehandlingen for DayRender-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan du tilpasser innholdet i en dato-celle, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnDayRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because the DayRender event is raised while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is being rendered, you cannot add a control that can also raise an event, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fordi DayRender-hendelsen oppstår når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>gjengis i kontrollen, kan du legge til en kontroll som kan også opprette en hendelse, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: You can only add static controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bare legge til statiske kontroller eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> </xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: hendelser og representanter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the days in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilegenskaper for dager i måneden som vises.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the days in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi stilen for dager i måneden som vises.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you do not specify a different style for the selected date, weekend dates, dates not in the currently displayed month, or today's date, these dates will also be displayed using the style specified by the DayStyle property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du ikke angir en annen stil for den valgte datoen, helgen datoer, datoer ikke i måneden som vises for øyeblikket eller dagens dato, disse datoene også vises ved hjelp av stil som er angitt av egenskapen DayStyle.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A> properties to specify alternative styles for these dates.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A>Egenskaper for å angi alternative stiler for disse datoene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.TodayDayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OtherMonthDayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.WeekendDayStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om annen stil egenskapene som kan kontrolleres, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains the style properties for the days in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som inneholder egenskapene stilen for dager i måneden som vises.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the day of the week to display in the first day column of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir dagen i uken som skal vises i den første dag-kolonnen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the FirstDayOfWeek property to specify the day of the week to display in the first day column of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk FirstDayOfWeek-egenskapen til å angi dagen i uken som skal vises i den første dag-kolonnen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: This property is set with one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er angitt med en av de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek>nummereringsverdier.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek>

trans-unit.source: You can specify any day of the week or `FirstDayOfWeek.Default`, which indicates that the date is determined by the system settings.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en hvilken som helst dagen i uken eller `FirstDayOfWeek.Default`, noe som angir at datoen avhenger av systeminnstillingene.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Default" name="Default" href=""></xref>, which indicates that the day specified in the system setting is used.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_Default" name="Default" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at dagen som er angitt i systeminnstillingen brukes.

trans-unit.source: The date specified is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte datoen er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FirstDayOfWeek"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode"></xref> object contains week selectors.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode"> </xref> objektet inneholder uken kolonneoverskriftene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode> values `DayWeek` and `DayWeekMonth` both contain week selectors.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode>verdier `DayWeek` og `DayWeekMonth` inneholder uken kolonneoverskriftene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode"></xref> contains week selectors; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarSelectionMode"> </xref> inneholder uken kolonneoverskriftene; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads a saved state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn en lagret tilstand for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the saved condition of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> som inneholder den lagrede tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed for the next month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som vises for neste måned navigasjonskontroll.

trans-unit.source: Use the NextMonthText property to provide custom text for the next month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen NextMonthText til å angi egendefinert tekst for neste måned navigasjonskontroll.

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used along with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A> property to provide a custom set of navigation controls.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis sammen med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A>til å angi et egendefinert sett med Sidenavigeringskontrollene vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property does not automatically encode to HTML.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne egenskapen ikke automatisk kode til HTML.

trans-unit.source: You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value, unless you want the characters to be treated as HTML.
trans-unit.target: Du må du konvertere spesialtegn til den riktige HTML-verdien, hvis du ikke vil tegn som skal behandles som HTML.

trans-unit.source: For example, to explicitly display the greater than symbol (>), you must use the value `>`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for å vise eksplisitt jo større enn symbolet (>), må du bruke verdien `>`.

trans-unit.source: Because this property does not automatically encode to HTML, it is possible to specify an HTML tag for the NextMonthText property.
trans-unit.target: Fordi denne egenskapen automatisk ikke kodes til HTML, er det mulig å angi en HTML-kode for egenskapen NextMonthText.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to display an image for the next month navigation control, you can set this property to an expression that contains an `` element.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du vil vise et bilde for kontrollen for navigasjon neste måned, du kan angi denne egenskapen til et uttrykk som inneholder en `` elementet.

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare hvis det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [ASP.NET globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The caption text for the next month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: Tekst til neste måned navigasjonskontroll.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_"&gt;"" name=""&gt;"" href=""></xref>, which is rendered as the greater than sign (>).
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_"&gt;"" name=""&gt;"" href=""> </xref>, som gjengis som Jo større enn (>).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format of the next and previous month navigation elements in the title section of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir formatet på den neste og forrige måneden navigasjonselementer i delen Tittel på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the NextPrevFormat property to specify the format for the next and previous month navigation elements on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen NextPrevFormat til å angi formatet for neste og forrige måned navigasjonselementer på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: This property is set with one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er angitt med en av de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat>nummereringsverdier.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat>

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the text for the navigation controls is displayed as the full month name, the short (abbreviated) month name, or custom text.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi om teksten for Sidenavigeringskontrollene vises vises som fullstendig månedsnavn, kort (forkortet) månedsnavn eller egen tekst.

trans-unit.source: To specify custom navigation text, set this property to `NextPrevFormat.CustomText` and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A> properties to the custom text.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en egendefinert Navigasjonstekst, angi denne egenskapen `NextPrevFormat.CustomText` og angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A>Egenskaper for egendefinert teksten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.PrevMonthText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare hvis det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_CustomText" name="CustomText" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_CustomText" name="CustomText" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified format is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Det angitte formatet er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.NextPrevFormat"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the next and previous month navigation elements.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilegenskaper for neste og forrige måned navigasjonselementer.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the next and previous month navigation elements.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi stilen for navigasjonselementene neste og forrige måned.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om annen stil egenskapene som kan kontrolleres, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare hvis det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The style properties for the next and previous month navigation elements.
trans-unit.target: Stilegenskaper for navigasjonselementene neste og forrige måned.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control and allows you to provide a custom handler for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender"> </xref> hendelse for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref> kontrollere og lar deg angi et egendefinert behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Although data binding is not supported for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells.
trans-unit.target: Selv om databinding ikke støttes for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontroll, er det mulig å endre innholdet og formatering for dato-celler.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control.
trans-unit.target: Før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontrollen skal vises på siden, oppretter og setter sammen komponentene som utgjør kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event is raised when each date cell in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is created.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>denne hendelsen oppstår når hver dato celle i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontrollen er opprettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>

trans-unit.source: You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere innholdet og formateringen celleegenskaper dato når den opprettes ved hjelp av koden i hendelsesbehandlingen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs> object that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesbehandlingen mottar en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs>objekt som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs> object contains two properties that you can use to programmatically control the format of the date cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs>objektet inneholder to egenskaper som du kan bruke til å kontrollere programmatisk formatet til date-cellen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A> property represents the cell being rendered, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Day%2A> property represents the date to render in the cell.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A>egenskapen representerer cellen gjengitt, da den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Day%2A>egenskapen representerer datoen til å gjengi i cellen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Day%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also customize the contents of a cell by dynamically adding controls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også tilpasse innholdet i en celle ved å dynamisk kontroller for å legge til den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>samling av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DayRenderEventArgs.Cell%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender> event is raised while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control is being rendered, you cannot add a control that can also raise an event, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fordi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>denne hendelsen oppstår under den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontrollen gjengis, kan du legge til en kontroll som kan også opprette en hendelse, for eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayRender>

trans-unit.source: You can only add static controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bare legge til statiske kontroller eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> </xref:System.Web.UI.LiteralControl?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: hendelser og representanter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The OnDayRender method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnDayRender kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> that contains information about the cell to render.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om cellen skal gjengis.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay"></xref> that contains information about the day to render.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CalendarDay"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om dagen å gjengi.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPreRender kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control and allows you to provide a custom handler for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged"> </xref> hendelse for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref> kontrollere og lar deg angi et egendefinert behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised when the user selects a day, a week, or an entire month by clicking the date selector controls.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren velger en dag, en uke eller en hele måneden ved å klikke dato velgeren kontrollene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: hendelser og representanter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The OnSelectionChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnSelectionChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control and allows you to provide a custom handler for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged"> </xref> hendelse for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref> kontrollere og lar deg angi et egendefinert behandlingsprogram for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged> event is raised when the user clicks the next or previous month navigation elements on the title section.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren klikker Neste eller forrige måned navigasjonselementer i delen tittel.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: hendelser og representanter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The OnVisibleMonthChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnVisibleMonthChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the month currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> som representerer måneden som vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the previous month displayed by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> som representerer forrige måned vises av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the days on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control that are not in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilegenskaper for dagene den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref> kontroll som ikke er i måneden som vises.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the days on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control that are not in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi stilen for dagene på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontroll som ikke er i måneden som vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: If the OtherMonthDayStyle property is not set, the style specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A> property is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen OtherMonthDayStyle ikke er angitt, stilen angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>egenskapen brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om annen stil egenskapene som kan kontrolleres, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that contains the style properties for the days on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control that are not in the displayed month.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som inneholder egenskapene stilen for dagene på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref> kontroll som ikke er i måneden som vises.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed for the previous month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som vises for forrige måned navigasjonskontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the PrevMonthText property to provide custom text for the previous month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen PrevMonthText oppgi egendefinert tekst for forrige måned navigasjonskontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used along with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A> property to provide a custom set of navigation controls.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis sammen med den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A>til å angi et egendefinert sett med Sidenavigeringskontrollene vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.NextMonthText%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property does not automatically encode to HTML.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne egenskapen ikke automatisk kode til HTML.

trans-unit.source: You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value, unless you want the characters to be treated as HTML.
trans-unit.target: Du må du konvertere spesialtegn til den riktige HTML-verdien, hvis du ikke vil tegn som skal behandles som HTML.

trans-unit.source: For example, to explicitly display the greater than symbol (>), you must use the value `>`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel for å vise eksplisitt jo større enn symbolet (>), må du bruke verdien `>`.

trans-unit.source: Because this property does not automatically encode to HTML, it is possible to specify an HTML tag for the PrevMonthText property.
trans-unit.target: Fordi denne egenskapen automatisk ikke kodes til HTML, er det mulig å angi en HTML-kode for egenskapen PrevMonthText.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to display an image for the next month navigation control, you can set this property to an expression that contains an `` element.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du vil vise et bilde for kontrollen for navigasjon neste måned, du kan angi denne egenskapen til et uttrykk som inneholder en `` elementet.

trans-unit.source: This property applies only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen gjelder bare hvis det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.ShowNextPrevMonth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [ASP.NET globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The caption text for the previous month navigation control.
trans-unit.target: Tekst til forrige måned navigasjonskontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_"&lt;"" name=""&lt;"" href=""></xref>, which is rendered as the less than sign (<).
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_"&lt;"" name=""&lt;"" href=""> </xref>, som gjengis som den mindre enn (<).

trans-unit.source: Raises an event for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer en hendelse for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref> kontrollerer når den legger inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: This event is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er brukt internt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the event argument passed to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som representerer hendelsen argumentet som sendes til hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Displays the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control on the client.
trans-unit.target: Viser den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref> kontroll på klienten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the output stream for rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som inneholder utdata dataflyten for gjengivelse på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Stores the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the saved state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder den lagrede tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the selected date.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den valgte datoen.

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedDate property to determine the selected date on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SelectedDate-egenskapen for å bestemme den valgte datoen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: The SelectedDate property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection are closely related.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SelectedDate og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>samlingen er nært relaterte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.Day`, a mode that allows only a single date selection, SelectedDate and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value and `SelectedDates.Count` equals 1.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>er satt til `CalendarSelectionMode.Day`, en modus som tillater bare en enkelt dato utvalg, SelectedDate og `SelectedDates[0]` ha samme verdi og `SelectedDates.Count` er lik 1.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, modes that allows multiple date selections, SelectedDate and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>er satt til `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` eller `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, modi som tillater flere datoer er valgt, SelectedDate og `SelectedDates[0]` ha samme verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SelectedDate property is set using a <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SelectedDate angis ved hjelp av en <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>objektet.</xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a date on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren velger en dato i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontroll av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: The SelectedDate property is updated to the selected date.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SelectedDate er oppdatert til den valgte datoen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection is also updated to contain just this date.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>samlingen også er oppdatert for å inneholde bare denne datoen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Both the SelectedDate property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A> collection are updated before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Både egenskapen SelectedDate og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>samlingen oppdateres før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDates%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override the date selection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A> event handler to manually set the SelectedDate property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre dato utvalget ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A>hendelsesbehandlingen til å angi egenskapen SelectedDate manuelt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event does not get raised when this property is programmatically set.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>hendelsen ikke hente opp når egenskapen settes programmatisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the selected date.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> som representerer den valgte datoen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the selected dates on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> objekter som representerer de valgte datoene på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedDates collection to determine the currently selected dates on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk SelectedDates-samlingen til å fastslå merkede datoene på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property and the SelectedDates collection are closely related.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>egenskapen og SelectedDates-samlingen er nært relaterte.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.Day`, a mode that allows only a single date selection, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value and `SelectedDates.Count` equals 1.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>er satt til `CalendarSelectionMode.Day`, en modus som tillater bare en enkelt dato-utvalg, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>og `SelectedDates[0]` ha samme verdi og `SelectedDates.Count` er lik 1.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A> property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, modes that allows multiple date selections, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>er satt til `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` eller `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, modi som tillater flere datoer er valgt, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>og `SelectedDates[0]` ha samme verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SelectedDates property stores a collection of <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> objects.
trans-unit.target: SelectedDates-egenskapen lagrer en samling av <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>objekter.</xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a week or month on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren velger en uke eller måned på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontroll av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: The selected dates are added to the SelectedDates collection, replacing the previous contents.
trans-unit.target: De valgte datoene legges til SelectedDates-samlingen erstatte tidligere innholdet.

trans-unit.source: The range of dates are sorted in ascending order by date.
trans-unit.target: Datoområdet er sortert i stigende rekkefølge etter dato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property is also updated to contain the first date in the SelectedDates collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>egenskapen oppdateres som inneholder den første datoen i SelectedDates-samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the SelectedDates collection to programmatically select dates on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke SelectedDates-samlingen programmatisk velge datoer på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Clear%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.SelectRange%2A> methods to programmatically manipulate the selected dates in the SelectedDates collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Clear%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.SelectRange%2A>metoder for å endre programmatisk de valgte datoene i SelectedDates-samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.SelectRange%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A> property and the SelectedDates collection are updated before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Både den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>egenskapen og SelectedDates-samlingen oppdateres før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override the date selection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A> event handler to manually set the SelectedDates collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre dato utvalget ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A>hendelsesbehandlingen til å angi SelectedDates-samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.OnSelectionChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged> event is not raised when this collection is programmatically set.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>denne hendelsen oppstår ikke når samlingssettet programmatisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref> that contains a collection of <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> objects representing the selected dates on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref> som inneholder en samling av <xref:System.DateTime?displayProperty=fullName> objekter som representerer de valgte datoene på den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SelectedDatesCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the style properties for the selected dates.
trans-unit.target: Henter stilegenskaper for de valgte datoene.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the style for the selected dates on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi stilen for de valgte datoene på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: If the SelectedDayStyle property is not set, the style specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A> property is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen SelectedDayStyle ikke er angitt, stilen angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>egenskapen brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.DayStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the different style properties that can be controlled, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om annen stil egenskapene som kan kontrolleres, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user selects a day, a week, or an entire month by clicking the date selector controls.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når brukeren velger en dag, en uke, eller hele måneden ved å klikke dato velgeren kontroller.

trans-unit.source: This event is raised when the user selects a day, a week, or an entire month by clicking the date selector controls.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren velger en dag, en uke, eller hele måneden ved å klikke dato velgeren kontroller.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
